arts.ttl: McAteer scores first Republic of Ireland goal in draw with Senegal
arts.sum: Kasey McAteer scored his first international goal for the Republic of Ireland as they played out an entertaining 1-1 draw with Senegal in Dublin.

arts.ttl: Kasey McAteer scores as Republic of Ireland and Senegal play out draw in Dublin
arts.sum: Republic of Ireland 1-1 Senegal: The hosts entertained in their first ever clash with the African nation

arts.ttl: How to watch Republic of Ireland vs Senegal: TV channel and live stream for friendly today
arts.sum: Heimir Hallgrímsson’s side recorded back-to-back wins in the last international window, but face a team unbeaten in 14 games
